Click NEXT when ready to start.|mb|p|nt|With less than 12 HCP you should pass the first time.|mb|p|mb|p|mb|1H|mb|1S|nt|You can Overcall with around 10+ points (maybe less with a good suit)|mb|2H|mb|2S|mb|3H|mb|3S|nt|Passing the opponents in 3H would have been an option, but you overbid slightly to 3S|mb|p|mb|p|mb|p|pc|H2|nt|They lead the Two of Hearts against your 3S contract.|pc|H4|pc|HK|pc|H3|pc|HA|pc|S2|nt|When you get the lead, you should try to draw the trumps|pc|H6|pc|H7|pc|S6|pc|S3|pc|SK|pc|S5|pc|S4|pc|S7|pc|SA|pc|S9|pc|SQ|pc|D8|pc|S8|pc|ST|pc|DK|nt|Then play some winners.|pc|D3|pc|D2|pc|D4|pc|DT|pc|D5|pc|D9|pc|DQ|pc|C8|pc|C3|pc|CA|pc|C6|pc|CQ|pc|C7|pc|CJ|pc|C4|pc|C2|pc|C9|pc|CK|pc|C5|pc|H5|pc|SJ|pc|H8|pc|HJ|pc|D7|pc|D6|pc|DA|pc|H9|pc|DJ|pc|HT|pc|CT|pc|HQ|
